Article.ArticleTitle: Cp*CoIII-catalyzed formal [4 + 2] cycloaddition of 2-phenyl-1H-imidazoles to afford imidazo[1,2-c]quinazoline derivatives.

AbstractText: A synthetic protocol based on Cp*CoIII-catalyzed C-H amidation/annulation of 2-aryl-1H-imidazoles with 1,4,2-dioxazol-5-ones was developed to give imidazo[1,2-c]quinazoline derivatives with broad substrate scope in moderate to good yields. The method has good prospects of application in the synthesis of imidazo[1,2-c]quinazoline drugs.
